entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as the one who had a conversation with Harry about his mother. She seems flustered and tries to ignore Harry's question.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who asks Aunt Petunia why she doesn't use his parents' names. He is also described as being stunned by Aunt Petunia's reaction.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as the one who tries to speak but struggles to remember how to talk about the magical world.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as being present in the conversation between Aunt Petunia and Harry.

relationships.description: Aunt Petunia has a conversation with Harry about his mother.
Uncle Vernon tries to communicate with Aunt Petunia but struggles to remember how to talk about the magical world.
Harry is present in the same conversation as Dudley.
